Title: Frenzy's SINGO
Details:
SINGO is a spin on traditional Bingo. Instead of listening for a number, players are listening for their favorite music.

There will be prizes and plenty of Frenzy beer on tap! Fun for the whole family!

Title: Frenzy's Adult Spell Check
Details: Gather your team of 1-6 players. There will be 4 rounds with 10 spelling words each round. Teams have 20 seconds to spell each word. The words will increase in difficulty each round.

Title: Lively's Trivia Night
Details:
PERHAPS THE WORLD'S GREATEST TRIVIA NIGHT.

Come answer very difficult questions while sipping beers and eating delicious dishes from a food truck. The fun starts at 7:00 - come early to snag your table! Check our social media for food truck info.

Title: Frenzy's Geeks Who Drink Trivia
Details:
Geeks Who Drink Pub Quiz is at the brewery every Wednesday beginning at 7 pm.

It's free to play, you can win prizes and Internet glory!

Do I need to sign up beforehand or can I just show up and play? Just show up. Seating fills up fast so show up early to ensure you get a table.

Team size is limited to six. Play solo if you'd like, but don't blame us if you're lonely.

All right, so what’s in it for me? Besides a couple hours of free entertainment, the top teams get bar prizes. Plus there are chances to win pints for answering five bonus questions throughout the evening. Finally, your team can revel in the eternal glory of having your photo posted.

Details:
Free 5k run + participants will receive a free pour after.

Check in with the bartender to get signed in. Either run with the group or on your own- route maps are available.

Title: Roughtail's Trivia Night
Details: Think you’re smart? Want to prove it? Join us on Thursdays from 7:00 to 9:00. Doors open at 3 pm and the kitchen opens at 4 pm. Multiple winners, gift cards, swag and frequent new releases! All ages welcome, free to play!

Title: Lively's Saturday 5k Beer Run
Details:
Every Saturday at noon Lively will be hosting a free 5k, and participants will receive a free pour of Lively Light after!

The run starts at the brewery at noon and goes down to Scissortail Park and Myriad Gardens and back. Check in with the bartender to get signed in and then either run with the group or on your own- route maps are available!

Must be 21 to claim beer, please run at your own risk.
